moves.7. Bxf6: White sees that may attack black on queen's side and makes the exchange.
moves.7... Qxf6: Capturing with the pawn seems safer.
moves.8. Bb5: White attempts to put black under pressure.
moves.9... Kd7:
Black seems very stingy here.
Castling keeps black in play.
moves.10... Kc7: Obviously the pawn can not capture the bishop because of 11.Ne5 and the Queen captures the pawn in c6
moves.11. Ne5: Bishop is safe. White centralized knight.
moves.11... a6: Last defensive chance or last mistake?
